checks.name: average_coverage_v1/average_coverage_v2 ratio
checks.failed_message: average_coverage_v1/average_coverage_v2 ratio is lower than 1.5; problems in sample biology or sample concentration for library preparation.
checks.passed_message: average_coverage_v1/average_coverage_v2 ratio is higher than 1.5; check passed.

checks.name: average_coverage_completeness_v1/v2
checks.failed_message: lower than 60; sample coverage is uneven, calling sensitivity in individual genes may deteriorate.
checks.passed_message: average_coverage_completeness_v1 and average_coverage_completeness_v2 are higher than 60; check passed.

checks.name: Total Deduplicated Percentage
checks.failed_message: Total Deduplicated Percentage is above than 90; library of low complexity, little source material has been loaded.
checks.passed_message: Total Deduplicated Percentage is lower than 90; check passed.

checks.name: Off-target
checks.failed_message: Off-target is above than 30; washing went poorly.
checks.passed_message: Off-target is lower than 30; check passed.

checks.name: Number_of_Reads_mln
checks.failed_message: Number_of_Reads_mln is lower than 200; the library is not completely sequenced
checks.passed_message: Number_of_Reads_mln is higher than 200; check passed.
